name: The Man Who Sold Plants
description:
The Man Who Sold Plants is a 16x16 bit, Top-Down action game set in the future. A man in a hazmat suit whose only goal is to grow and vaporize as many plants as possible. Do you have what it takes to reach the highest score as possible before the time runs out? Play to find out!!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A game designed and programmed by TunzTunzTuns and NoShell.

https://itch.io/profile/tunztunztunz

Music/Sound by Deebles

Used some assets from MurphysDad's Sci-Fi Facility Asset Pack

Addition pixel art by Spinky and TunzTunzTunz

Play testing - Timopée Chalbidet

Link: https://murphysdad.itch.io/sci-fi-facility

This was our game jam project for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022." This Jam's theme was Nature.
